verses.verse: Now it came<WH1961> to pass, when Adonizedec<WH139> king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389> had heard<WH8085> how<WH3588> Joshua<WH3091> had taken<WH3920> Ai,<WH5857> and had utterly destroyed<WH2763> it; as he had done<WH6213> to Jericho<WH3405> and her king,<WH4428> so<WH3651> he had done<WH6213> to Ai<WH5857> and her king;<WH4428> and how<WH3588> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gibeon<WH1391> had made peace<WH7999> with Israel,<WH3478> and were among<WH7130> them;

That they feared<WH3372> greatly,<WH3966> because<WH3588> Gibeon<WH1391> was a great<WH1419> city,<WH5892> as one<WH259> of the royal<WH4467> cities,<WH5892> and because<WH3588> it was greater<WH1419> than<WH4480> Ai,<WH5857> and all<WH3605> the men<WH582> thereof were mighty.<WH1368>

Why Adonizedec<WH139> king<WH4428> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> sent<WH7971> to Hoham<WH1944> king<WH4428> of Hebron,<WH2275> and to Piram<WH6502> king<WH4428> of Jarmuth,<WH3412> and to Japhia<WH3309> king<WH4428> of Lachish,<WH3923> and to Debir<WH1688> king<WH4428> of Eglon,<WH5700> saying,<WH559>
Come<WH5927> up to me, and help<WH5826> me, that we may smite<WH5217> Gibeon:<WH1391> for it has made peace<WH7999> with Joshua<WH3091> and with the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

Therefore the five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> the king<WH4428> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> the king<WH4428> of Hebron,<WH2275> the king<WH4428> of Jarmuth,<WH3412> the king<WH4428> of Lachish,<WH3923> the king<WH4428> of Eglon,<WH5700> gathered<WH622> themselves together, and went<WH5927> up, they and all<WH3605> their hosts,<WH4264> and encamped<WH2583> before<WH5921> Gibeon,<WH1391> and made war<WH3898> against<WH5921> it.

And the men<WH582> of Gibeon<WH1391> sent<WH7971> to Joshua<WH3091> to the camp<WH4264> to Gilgal,<WH1537> saying,<WH559> Slack<WH7503> not your hand<WH3027> from your servants;<WH5650> come<WH5927> up to us quickly,<WH4120> and save<WH3467> us, and help<WH5826> us: for all the kings<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567> that dwell<WH3427> in the mountains<WH2022> are gathered<WH6908> together against<WH413> us.
So Joshua<WH3091> ascended<WH5927> from Gilgal,<WH1537> he, and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of war<WH4421> with him, and all<WH3605> the mighty<WH1368> men of valor.<WH2428>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Joshua,<WH3091> Fear<WH3372> them not: for I have delivered<WH5414> them into your hand;<WH3027> there shall not a man<WH376> of them stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> you.
Joshua<WH3091> therefore came<WH935> to them suddenly,<WH6597> and went<WH5927> up from Gilgal<WH1537> all<WH3605> night.<WH3915>

And the LORD<WH3068> discomfited<WH1949> them before<WH6440> Israel,<WH3478> and slew<WH5221> them with a great<WH1419> slaughter<WH4347> at Gibeon,<WH1391> and chased<WH7291> them along the way<WH1870> that goes<WH4609> up to Bethhoron,<WH1032> and smote<WH5221> them to Azekah,<WH5825> and to Makkedah.<WH4719>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, as they fled<WH5127> from before<WH6440> Israel,<WH3478> and were in the going<WH4174> down<WH4174> to Bethhoron,<WH1032> that the LORD<WH3068> cast<WH7993> down great<WH1419> stones<WH68> from heaven<WH8064> on them to Azekah,<WH5825> and they died:<WH4191> they were more<WH7227> which<WH834> died<WH4191> with hailstones<WH68> <WH1259> than they whom<WH834> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> slew<WH2026> with the sword.<WH2719>

Then<WH227> spoke<WH1696> Joshua<WH3091> to the LORD<WH3068> in the day<WH3117> when the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> up the Amorites<WH567> before<WH6440> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and he said<WH559> in the sight<WH5869> of Israel,<WH3478> Sun,<WH8121> stand<WH1826> you still<WH1826> on Gibeon;<WH1391> and you, Moon,<WH3394> in the valley<WH6010> of Ajalon.<WH357>

And the sun<WH8121> stood<WH1826> still,<WH1826> and the moon<WH3394> stayed,<WH5975> until<WH5704> the people<WH1471> had avenged<WH5358> themselves on their enemies.<WH341> Is not this<WH1931> written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of Jasher?<WH3477> So the sun<WH8121> stood<WH5975> still in the middle<WH2677> of heaven,<WH8064> and hurried<WH213> not to go<WH935> down about a whole<WH8549> day.<WH3117>

And there was no<WH3808> day<WH3117> like that before<WH6440> it or after<WH310> it, that the LORD<WH3068> listened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of a man:<WH376> for the LORD<WH3068> fought<WH3898> for Israel.<WH3478>
And Joshua<WH3091> returned,<WH7725> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him, to the camp<WH4264> to Gilgal.<WH1537>
But these<WH428> five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> fled,<WH5127> and hid<WH2244> themselves in a cave<WH4631> at Makkedah.<WH4719>
And it was told<WH5046> Joshua,<WH3091> saying,<WH559> The five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> are found<WH4672> hid<WH2244> in a cave<WH4631> at Makkedah.<WH4719>
And Joshua<WH3091> said,<WH559> Roll<WH1556> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> on the mouth<WH6310> of the cave,<WH4631> and set<WH6485> men<WH582> by it for to keep<WH8104> them:

And stay<WH5975> you not, but pursue<WH7291> after<WH310> your enemies,<WH341> and smite the hindmost<WH2179> of them; suffer<WH5414> them not to enter<WH935> into<WH413> their cities:<WH5892> for the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has delivered<WH5414> them into your hand.<WH3027>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when Joshua<WH3091> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> had made an end<WH3615> of slaying<WH5221> them with a very<WH3966> great<WH1419> slaughter,<WH4347> till<WH5704> they were consumed,<WH8552> that the rest<WH8300> which remained<WH8277> of them entered<WH935> into<WH413> fenced<WH4013> cities.<WH5892>

And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> returned<WH7725> to the camp<WH4264> to Joshua<WH3091> at Makkedah<WH4719> in peace:<WH7965> none<WH3808> moved<WH2782> his tongue<WH3956> against any of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
Then said<WH559> Joshua,<WH3091> Open<WH6605> the mouth<WH6310> of the cave,<WH4631> and bring<WH3318> out those<WH428> five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> to me out of the cave.<WH4631>

And they did<WH6213> so,<WH3651> and brought<WH3318> forth<WH3318> those<WH428> five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> to him out of the cave,<WH4631> the king<WH4428> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> the king<WH4428> of Hebron,<WH2275> the king<WH4428> of Jarmuth, the king<WH4428> of Lachish,<WH3923> and the king<WH4428> of Eglon.<WH5700>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when they brought<WH3318> out those<WH428> kings<WH4428> to Joshua,<WH3091> that Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for all<WH3605> the men<WH376> of Israel,<WH3478> and said<WH559> to the captains<WH7101> of the men of war<WH4421> which went<WH1980> with him, Come<WH7126> near,<WH7126> put<WH7760> your feet<WH7272> on the necks<WH6677> of these<WH428> kings.<WH4428> And they came<WH7126> near,<WH7126> and put<WH7760> their feet<WH7272> on the necks<WH6677> of them.

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> to them, Fear<WH3372> not, nor<WH408> be dismayed,<WH2865> be strong<WH2388> and of good courage:<WH553> for thus<WH3602> shall the LORD<WH3068> do<WH6213> to all<WH3605> your enemies<WH341> against whom<WH834> <WH853> you fight.<WH3898>

And afterward<WH310> <WH3651> Joshua<WH3091> smote<WH5221> them, and slew<WH4191> them, and hanged<WH8518> them on<WH5921> five<WH2568> trees:<WH6086> and they were hanging<WH8518> on the trees<WH6086> until<WH5704> the evening.<WH6153>

And it came<WH1961> to pass at the time<WH6256> of the going<WH935> down of the sun,<WH8121> that Joshua<WH3091> commanded,<WH6680> and they took<WH3381> them down<WH3381> off<WH5921> the trees,<WH6086> and cast<WH7993> them into<WH413> the cave<WH4631> wherein<WH834> <WH8033> they had been hid,<WH2244> and laid<WH7760> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> in the cave's<WH4631> mouth,<WH6310> which remain until<WH5704> this<WH2088> very<WH6106> day.<WH3117>

And that day<WH3117> Joshua<WH3091> took<WH3920> Makkedah,<WH4719> and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and the king<WH4428> thereof he utterly destroyed,<WH2763> them, and all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that were therein; he let none<WH3808> remain:<WH8300> and he did<WH6213> to the king<WH4428> of Makkedah<WH4719> as he did<WH6213> to the king<WH4428> of Jericho.<WH3405>
Then Joshua<WH3091> passed<WH5674> from Makkedah,<WH4719> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him, to Libnah,<WH3841> and fought<WH3898> against<WH5973> Libnah:<WH3841>

And the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> it also,<WH1571> and the king<WH4428> thereof, into the hand<WH3027> of Israel;<WH3478> and he smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that were therein; he let none<WH3808> remain<WH8300> in it; but did<WH6213> to the king<WH4428> thereof as he did<WH6213> to the king<WH4428> of Jericho.<WH3405>
And Joshua<WH3091> passed<WH5674> from Libnah,<WH3841> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him, to Lachish,<WH3923> and encamped<WH2583> against<WH5921> it, and fought<WH3898> against it:

And the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> Lachish<WH3923> into the hand<WH3027> of Israel,<WH3478> which took<WH3920> it on the second<WH8145> day,<WH3117> and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that were therein, according to all<WH3605> that he had done<WH6213> to Libnah.<WH3841>

Then<WH227> Horam<WH2036> king<WH4428> of Gezer<WH1507> came<WH5927> up to help<WH5826> Lachish;<WH3923> and Joshua<WH3091> smote<WH5221> him and his people,<WH5971> until<WH5704> he had left<WH7604> him none<WH1115> remaining.<WH8300>
And from Lachish<WH3923> Joshua<WH3091> passed<WH5674> to Eglon,<WH5700> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him; and they encamped<WH2583> against<WH5921> it, and fought<WH3898> against it:

And they took<WH3920> it on that day,<WH3117> and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that were therein he utterly destroyed<WH2763> that day,<WH3117> according to all<WH3605> that he had done<WH6213> to Lachish.<WH3923>
And Joshua<WH3091> went<WH5927> up from Eglon,<WH5700> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him, to Hebron;<WH2275> and they fought<WH3898> against<WH5921> it:

And they took<WH3920> it, and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and the king<WH4428> thereof, and all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> thereof, and all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that were therein; he left<WH7604> none<WH3808> remaining,<WH8300> according to all<WH3605> that he had done<WH6213> to Eglon;<WH5700> but destroyed<WH2763> it utterly, and all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that were therein.
And Joshua<WH3091> returned,<WH7725> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him, to Debir;<WH1688> and fought<WH3898> against<WH5921> it:

And he took<WH3920> it, and the king<WH4428> thereof, and all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> thereof; and they smote<WH5221> them with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and utterly destroyed<WH2763> all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that were therein; he left<WH7604> none<WH3808> remaining:<WH8300> as he had done<WH6213> to Hebron,<WH2275> so<WH3651> he did<WH6213> to Debir,<WH1688> and to the king<WH4428> thereof; as he had done<WH6213> also to Libnah,<WH3841> and to her king.<WH4428>

So Joshua<WH3091> smote<WH5221> all<WH3605> the country<WH776> of the hills,<WH2022> and of the south,<WH5045> and of the vale,<WH8219> and of the springs,<WH794> and all<WH3605> their kings:<WH4428> he left<WH7604> none<WH3808> remaining,<WH8300> but utterly destroyed<WH2763> all<WH3605> that breathed,<WH5397> as the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> commanded.<WH6680>
And Joshua<WH3091> smote<WH5221> them from Kadeshbarnea<WH6947> even to Gaza,<WH5804> and all<WH3605> the country<WH776> of Goshen,<WH1657> even to Gibeon.<WH1391>

And all<WH3605> these<WH428> kings<WH4428> and their land<WH776> did Joshua<WH3091> take<WH3920> at one<WH259> time,<WH6471> because<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> fought<WH3898> for Israel.<WH3478>
And Joshua<WH3091> returned,<WH7725> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him, to the camp<WH4264> to Gilgal.<WH1537>
